      • convertFromIPv4MappedAddress

        public static byte[] convertFromIPv4MappedAddress(byte[] addr)
        Convert IPv4-Mapped address to IPv4 address. Both input and returned value are in network order binary form.
        Parameters:
        addr - a byte array representing an IPv4-Mapped address
        Returns:
        a byte array representing the IPv4 numeric address

      • isIPv4MappedAddress

        public static boolean isIPv4MappedAddress(byte[] addr)
        Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IPv4 mapped IPv6 address.
        Parameters:
        addr - a byte array representing an IPv4-Mapped address
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the InetAddress is an IPv4 mapped IPv6 address; or false if address is IPv4 address.

      • getIPv4Number

        public static int getIPv4Number(String s)

      • isIPv4

        public static boolean isIPv4(String src)
        Parameters:
        src - a String representing an IPv4 address in textual format
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether src is an IPv4 literal address

      • isIPv6

        public static boolean isIPv6(String src)
        Parameters:
        src - a String representing an IPv6 address in textual format
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether src is an IPv6 literal address
